input.sentences: the two of us decided it was time to see the sights .
we saw the clinton memorial | which is a much larger version of another memorial .
we saw some other things that we really can not describe though .
we all had a lot of fun going and looking around .
i wish we could go next year | but it 's so expensive
output.sentences: they were so glad they decided to take the time and see all the sights
this version of the memoerial was way larger then i could have imagined
the memorial was amazing and very beautiful
they were the happiest they had been in a very long time
even tho the trip was a littlt expensive it was so worth it in the end it was the best decision we made
